camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.period.name: camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.period
camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.period.description: The interval between fetches to the Dropbox remote path in milliseconds

camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.accessToken.name: camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.accessToken
camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.accessToken.description: The access Token to use to access Dropbox

camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.remotePath.name: camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.remotePath
camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.remotePath.description: Original file or folder to work with

camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.query.name: camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.query
camel.kamelet.dropbox-source.query.description: A space-separated list of sub-strings to search for. A file matches only if it contains all the sub-strings. If this option is not set, all files will be matched.
